pr_title: #3761 move from node-sass to sass in presentation server

timeline.message:
#3761 move from node-sass to sass in presenttion server

Signed-off-by: David Radley <david_radley@uk.ibm.com>
Merge branch 'git3761' of https://github.com/davidradl/egeria into git3761

timeline.bodyText: Need to clean up the residue from Git conflict resolutions
timeline.author: grahamwallis
